function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited support for the idea that physical activity helps reduce disease severity","Impact":"Reduced potential for disease severity reduction","Mitigation":"Encourage physical activity while emphasizing other preventive measures such as vaccination and mask-wearing","Technologies":"N/A","People":"General population","Owner":"Health organizations, governments, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate guidance for home-based exercises during confinement","Impact":"Reduced ability to maintain or improve physical fitness","Mitigation":"Provide clear and specific guidelines for home-based exercises, create virtual exercise programs, promote online fitness resources","Technologies":"Virtual fitness platforms, online training programs","People":"Individuals in confinement","Owner":"Health and fitness organizations, virtual fitness platforms"},{"Description":"Inconsistent recommendations for older individuals regarding exercise programs","Impact":"Confusion and potential incorrect implementation of exercise recommendations","Mitigation":"Provide standardized and clear exercise guidelines for older individuals, offer personalized exercise consultations, educate caregivers and support networks","Technologies":"Personalized exercise apps, video consultations","People":"Older individuals, caregivers","Owner":"Health and fitness professionals, caregivers"}]}
